original_text: So Paul did not speak in the Jewish meeting place any more. Instead, he went to the house of Titius Justus, which was next to the meeting place. Justus was a Gentile who now worshipped God.
korean_text: 거기서 옮겨 하나님을 경외하는 디도 유스도라 하는 사람의 집에 들어가니 그 집은 회당 옆이라

sentences.original_text: So Paul did not speak in the Jewish meeting place any more.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 바울은 더 이상 유대인 회당에서 말하지 않았습니다.

sentences.original_text: Instead, he went to the house of Titius Justus,
sentences.korean_translation: 대신에 그는 티티우스 유스투스의 집으로 갔습니다,

sentences.original_text: which was next to the meeting place.
